title: (2) These Regulations come into operation on the 21st day of February 2022.
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Licensing of
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Licensing of 

Drivers) (Amendment) Regulations 2022. 

(2) These Regulations come into operation on the 21st day of February 2022.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited european union (licensing drivers) (amendment) regulation 2022 (2) regulation come operation 21st day february 2022

title: (2) These Regulations come into operation on the 21st day of February 2022.
heading: 2. Regulation 10 of the Road Traffic (Licensing of Drivers) Regulations
text_raw:
2. Regulation 10 of the Road Traffic (Licensing of Drivers) Regulations 
2006 (S.I. No. 537 of 2006) is amended by the deletion of paragraph (2) (inserted 
by the European Union (Licensing of Drivers) (Validity of Licences) 
Regulations 2015 (S.I. No. 176 of 2015) and amended by the Road Traffic 
(Licensing of Drivers) (Amendment) Regulations 2015 (S.I. No. 242 of 2015)). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

15 February, 2022. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

1 OJ No. L403, 30.12.2006, p.18 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 18th February, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [52] 3

title: (2) These Regulations come into operation on the 21st day of February 2022.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations delete paragraph (2) of Regulation 10 of the Road Traffic 
(Licensing of Drivers) Regulations 2006 (S.I. No. 537 of 2006). An amended 
Regulation 10(2) is inserted by the Road Traffic (Licensing of Driver) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 53 of 2022). 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [52]
